refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This is the ocha daemon. It'll listen for the key accelerator and open the query window when it is pressed. See ocha's GNOME documentation for details.
ochad registers itself to the GNOME session managers and makes sure it'll be restarted automatically next time the current user logs in.
If you don't use the GNOME session manager, you'll need to start the ocha daemon every time you log in. This might be done by adding the command ochad& to ~/.xinitrc or ~/.Xsession
